data.actual_result: The text keeps going out the side of the box, stretching it beyond the initial bounds
data.expected_result: The text box would automatically scroll sideways so only a limited amount was visible, keeping the box the same size
data.short_description: Typing a long name into the box when adding an undetected game stretches the box out the side [Not an extention of 5913/<https://trello.com/c/9c1bm8YW>]
data.steps_to_repro: - Open user settings - Go to "Games" - Click "Add it!" to add an undetected game - start typing in the box - keep typing until you go past the end of the box
